sentences.en: A year on, the threat of implosion of another prime broker has receded.
sentences.cn: 一年过去了, 大宗经纪商再次出现破产的威胁已经减弱.

sentences.en: But any is preferable to the implosion of the euro zone.
sentences.cn: 但是,采纳任何一种措施都比欧元区崩溃要强.

sentences.en: But the movement's implosion is nevertheless astonishing.
sentences.cn: 然而,这场运动的内爆令人震惊.

sentences.en: The auto - acceleration effect ( gel - effect ) had been analysed to propose the solution to the implosion of reaction.
sentences.cn: 在分析聚合过程的自加速效应 ( 凝胶效应 ) 的基础上,提出了解决爆聚问题的办法.

sentences.en: The longer - term consequences of a North Korean implosion are also unwelcome to Beijing.
sentences.cn: 从更加 长远 的角度来看,朝鲜内爆的后果不是北京所愿意看到的.

trans.tran_cn: 向心聚爆，内爆，向心压挤，（文化等的）集中
